input.sentences: the thompsons went on a vacation
they spent most of their time in the pool at their hotel .
the room they stayed in was very spacious
[male] thompson and his dad got a picture with the hotel manager -- he was so helpful .
later that night the thompsons went to a show .
output.sentences: This is the vacation with the Thompsons.
They spent a lot of time at the pool.
The Thompsons took a picture with the manager.
The Thompsons had a great night.
